name: Magnetron Rebellion
description:
You are a single ship outnumbered and outgunned by the enemy fleet. The one advantage you have is a powerful magnet that is capable of capturing the enemy bullets and firing them back! Just be warned, the magnet is only strong enough to hold onto 7 bullets at once. If you try to grab another bullet while holding 7, you will get hit!

Controls: WASD to move, Hold Space to active the magnet, Left Click to fire captured bullets.
